tu.note: IMPORTANT: Native transcription of the language (e.g. Dansk, Deutsch, English). IMPORTANT: "English" should not be just translated! IMPORTANT: If the rest of the xml:lang attribute is left with the value "en", it's crucial to update the one of this entry with the correct value (e.g. fr, it, zh_CN, etc.).
test
Help text associated to the prefix 'action'

tuv.seg: Welcome to Twetailer. Whenever you look for something, post your demand to Twetailer.\ If you're a consumer, tweet 'help consumer'. If you're a retailer then tweet 'help retailer'.

tu.note: Help text associated to the prefix 'action'

tuv.seg: This prefix introduces a command, like 'demand' or 'list' followed by other attributes.|\ A useful shortcut is the exclamation mark (!). The command 'action:list' can be submitted as '!list'.

Help text associated to the keyword 'founders'

tuv.seg: Twetailer is Steven's original idea, with Dom at the realization stage ;)

tu.note: Help text associated to the keyword 'consumer'

tuv.seg: Whenever you look for something, post your demand to Twetailer.|\ Tweet something like 'wii console'. The first time, please give your postal code and the country code with 'loc: 95423 US'.|\ Twetailer will broadcast your demand to the retailers in your area.|\ If any retailer propose something, Twetailer will forward the proposal to you immediately.|\ If you accept a proposal, the retailer should keep it and you can pick it up at his store later.|\ The ability to reserve a product is offered as a free service by Twetailer.|\ In a near future, you will be able to purchase the product online to secure your reservation. Stay tuned.|\ All feedback can be posted on http://www.twetailer.com/feedback.
